author: lightclient
content: anyone know why timestamp is `U256` in execution specs but gas limit is number is `Uint` in the specs? both are "scalar" values in yellow paper, trying to figure out if there is a reason for the distinction

author: sky.cactus
content: There were some EIPs a while back that tried to change some of those to uint64.  I don't remember if they were ever finalized.

author: lightclient
content: right, i think that was just limiting account nonces though
